creator: jihlenburg@harmanbecker.com
text:
Hi,

I've enhanced P4Change by the ability to delete pending (empty) changelists.
Tho faciliate this, the new P4Change task takes two additional attributes:
"change" -> the number of a cahngelist to work on (optional)
"delete" -> "true" if the change list specified by "change" should be deleted,
"false" otherwise (optional)
For further details see
"http://www.perforce.com/perforce/doc.051/manuals/cmdref/change.html#1040665"

creator: jihlenburg@harmanbecker.com

text: We have removed the Perforce Ant tasks from the current trunk, they are now superseded by the Ant tasks supplied by Perforce Inc.
